body:
While building `py-jupyter-notebook` (and its dependencies, of which this is one) I accidentally wrote a dependency restriction like this:

```
depends_on('py-traitlets@5.0:@5.0:`)
```

I would assume this to end up with a syntax error, but it didn't. I'm unsure what would happen if the two versions would be different or even mutually exclusive. Opening this issue to have a place to write down further investigation (though I'm not sure when I'll get to that)
title: Multiple version constraints in a spec are not a syntax error
